main.name: Anthony Christopher
main.DitemA: Determined and hardworking, I find pleasure in the proccess and being the best I can be.
main.bio: With a degree in Computer Science and Business from Whitworth University, I've cultivated a multifaceted skill set. Currently, I'm immersed in digital project management, software development, and sales at 14Four, refining my expertise in these domains. I also created LavTech my own web development venture. During our recent conversation, we discussed my aptitude for problem-solving and knack for innovative solutions, which I believe would be valuable contributions to any team. I'm genuinely excited about the opportunity to leverage these skills in a collaborative environment for mutual growth and success.

education.degree: Bachelors Degree in Computer Science and Business

work.title: Digital Project Manager
work.DitemA: - Managing digital projects with companies like Nike, Meta, Gatorade, Dick's,Monster Energy, and more scheduled meetings with clients, Created scopes of work for large clients, Sales, Developed AI-related projects to increase 14Four brand recognition

work.DitemA: - Spearheaded the end-to-end development and deployment of diverse websites and web advertisements, showcasing adeptness in Nuxt, React, GSAP and JavaScript
work.DitemB: - Produced captivating and dynamic web banner ads, leveraging animation techniques to enhance engagement and user experience
work.DitemC: - Contributed substantially to the development of websites for prominent industry giants such as Nike, Gatorade, and Rock-star, showcasing expertise and adaptability in meeting corporate standards and requirements

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.DitemA: - Conducted comprehensive testing on the web application, meticulously identifying bugs and implementing improvements to elevate overall functionality and user experience
work.DitemB: - Played a pivotal role in liaising with clients to gather and comprehend project specifications, ensuring alignment between client expectations and development objectives
work.DitemC: - Executed comprehensive quality assurance measures, ensuring high standards of functionality, usability, and performance within the web application

work.title: Application/Web Developer
work.DitemA: - Led the end-to-end development of a comprehensive website for a local nonprofit organization, demonstrating expertise in React, JavaScript, SQL, and Django to deliver a robust digital platform
work.DitemB: - Produced compelling and visually engaging graphics, contributing to the brand identity and aesthetic appeal of the company's digital presence, and enhancing overall user experience and engagement
